summary: A college lecturer flees to Paris after a scandal costs him his job. In the City of Light, he meets a widow who might be involved in a series of murders.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Kristin Scott Thomas|Joanna Kulig|Samir Guesmi|Delphine Chuillot|Julie Papillon|Geoffrey Carey|Mamadou Minte|Mohamed Aroussi|Jean-Louis Cassarino|Judith Burnett|Marcela Iacub|Wilfred Benaïche|Pierre Marcoux|Rosine Favey|Anne Benoît|Grégory Gadebois|Donel Jacksman|Laurent Lévy|Doug Rand|Tercelin Kirtley|Nicolas Beaucaire|Serge Bozon|Marie Anne Guerin
title: La mujer del quinto
